name: clientiq-dev-scripts
description: Development scripts for ClientIQ full-stack application

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source ../.venv/bin/activate && python manage.py migrate && python manage.py runserver 8000
scripts.setup: python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.migrate: cd backend && source ../.venv/bin/activate && python manage.py migrate
scripts.seed: cd backend && source ../.venv/bin/activate && python manage.py setup_dev_data
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && source ../.venv/bin/activate && python manage.py test
